程序包 org.giiwa.dao

类 RDSHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.RDSHelper
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Helper.DBHelper

    public class RDSHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Helper.DBHelper
    The RDSHelper Class is base class for all class that database access, it almost includes all methods that need for database
    all data access MUST be inherited from it

        public void close​(java.lang.Object... objs)
        Close the objects, the object cloud be ResultSet, Statement, PreparedStatement, Connection
        if the connection was required twice in same thread, then the reference "-1", if "=0", then close it.
        参数:
        objs - the objects of "ResultSet, Statement, Connection"

        public <T extends Bean> Beans<T> loadBy​(java.lang.String select,
                                        Helper.W q,
                                        int offset,
                                        int limit,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        advance load API.
        类型参数:
        T - the base object
        参数:
        select - the select section, etc: "select a.* from tbluser a, tblrole b where a.uid=b.uid"
        q - the additional query condition;
        offset - the offset
        limit - the limit
        clazz - the Class Bean
        返回:
        List the list of Bean
